Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation

This package contains classes which support BPEL validation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeBaseErrorReporter Interface for reporting errors and warnings found during the analysis of a deployment plan or bpel process.
IAeErrorReporter Specification for error reporting classes.
IAePartnerLinkOperationUser Interface for a model that uses a partner link.
IAeValidationContext This interface defines a context that will be used by the def validation visitor during validation.
IAeValidationDefs Interface definition for error reporting, primarily for validation errors.
IAeValidator interface for the model classes.
 

Class Summary
AeBaseValidator Base class for all validation models.
AeBPWSDefToValidationVisitor BPEL4WS validation visitor
AeDefToValidationVisitor Visits the def to create validators
AeErrorReporter Definition layer (run-time) error reporter.
AeLinkCycleVisitor Locates links that participate in control cycles.
AeLinkValidator Validation helper for link collection and testing.
AeLinkValidator.AeLinkComposite Composite link inner class used to manage validation of link definitions.
AeLinkValidator.AeLinkDirection Inner class that serves as a flag for the direction of a link
AeLinkValidator.AeLinkSource Inner class to facilitate cycle checking.
AeMessageExchangeValidationVisitor Visits the receives and replies to ensure that they're matched up with their plink, operation, and message exchange values.
AeValidationContext A simple validation context impl.
AeVariableValidator Model for validating variables.
AeWSBPELAbstractProcessDefToValidationVisitor WSBPEL 2.0 Abstract process validation visitor.O
AeWSBPELDefToValidationVisitor WSBPEL validation visitor
AeWSBPELVariableValidator Extens base validtor to check that import exists for message type variables.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation Description

This package contains classes which support BPEL validation. The main class is AeDefValidationVisitor, which is based on our definition visitor interface. It visits all the definition objects and verifies them as being bpel compliant as well as checking that all internal and external references can be resolved. The IAeErrorreporter class is supplied by callers so they can create customized erorr handlers for logging, etc.
